name: Air Force
description: The Nike Air Force is iconic in the world of athletic footwear. It offers comfort and style with every step, perfect for both everyday use and sports activities.

name: Dunk Low Retro
description: The Nike Dunk Low Retro combines a classic design with modern colors. Its versatile style makes it a popular choice among urban fashion enthusiasts.

name: Nike Blazer
description: The Nike Blazer is a reinvented classic. With its high profile and distinctive style, it offers a retro look that fits current trends.

name: Air Max
description: The Nike Air Max is known for its visible cushioning unit in the heel, providing comfort and style. Perfect for those seeking athletic footwear with advanced technology.

name: Air Max Plus
description: The Nike Air Max Plus combines cushioning and bold design. With its characteristic stripe and striking details, it's a popular choice among sports fashion enthusiasts.

name: Air Jordan 1 Mid
description: The Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid is a timeless classic in the basketball world. With its legendary design and versatile style, it's ideal both on and off the court.

name: Air Jordan 1 Low
description: The Nike Air Jordan 1 Low captures the essence of basketball in a versatile design. With modern colors and classic details, it's a stylish choice for any occasion.

name: Air Jordan 3 Retro
description: The Nike Air Jordan 3 Retro is famous for its elephant print and innovative design. A blend of history and contemporary style for brand enthusiasts.

name: Air Jordan 11 Retro
description: The Nike Air Jordan 11 Retro is legendary in the basketball world. With its eye-catching design and cutting-edge technology, it delivers exceptional performance on the court.

name: Jordan Pro Strong
description: The Nike Jordan Pro Strong pays tribute to Jordan's legacy. With its classic design and modern details, it offers performance and style with every step.

name: Infinity RN4
description: The Nike Infinity RN 4 are running shoes designed to provide comfort and support on every run. With responsive cushioning and a secure fit, they're ideal for runners.

name: Pegasus 40 SE
description: The Nike Pegasus 40 SE is a benchmark in the running world. With its combination of cushioning and speed, it's ideal for runners of all levels.

name: Invincible 3
description: The Nike Invincible 3 are high-performance running shoes. With their soft cushioning and energy return, they provide comfort on long distances.

name: Zoom Fly 5
description: The Nike Zoom Fly 5 is designed for speed and efficiency in races. With its carbon plate and responsive cushioning, it offers an extra boost with every stride.

name: Vapor Fly 3
description: The Nike VaporFly 3 are favorites among elite runners. Designed for exceptional performance, they provide a combination of lightweight and speed.

name: Tiempo Legend 10
description: The Nike Tiempo Legend 10 is a classic in the football world. With its premium leather and perfect fit, it offers control and precision on the field.

name: Phantom GX Elite
description: The Nike Phantom GX Elite is ideal for creative players. With its low-cut design and extended impact zone, it allows exceptional ball control.

name: Mercurial Superfly 9
description: The Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 is synonymous with speed in football. With its snug fit and agile traction, it's designed for explosive players.

name: Mercurial Vapor 15
description: The Nike Mercurial Vapor 15 offers speed and agility. With its lightweight construction and improved traction, it's ideal for outpacing opponents.

name: Phantom Luna
description: The Nike Phantom Luna is indoor football footwear designed for control and agility in confined spaces. Its low-cut design provides freedom of movement.

name: LeBron NXXT
description: The Nike LeBron NXXT is the choice of powerful players. With advanced cushioning and reinforced support, it offers performance and style on the basketball court.

name: Luka 1
description: The Nike Luka 1 is basketball footwear designed in collaboration with Luka Dončić. With its unique style and cutting-edge technology, it pays homage to the game's star.

name: LeBron 20
description: The Nike LeBron 20 combines style and performance in basketball. With its eye-catching design and innovative technology, it provides support and traction on the court.

name: Precision 6
description: The Nike Precision 6 is ideal for versatile play in basketball. With its comfortable fit and multidirectional traction, it offers agility in every move.

name: Zion 2
description: The Nike Zion 2 is Zion Williamson's footwear. With its reactive cushioning and striking design, it's designed for explosive and energetic players.

name: Metcon 9
description: The Nike Metcon 9 is versatile training footwear. With its durability and stability, it's ideal for a variety of exercises in the gym.

name: Metcon 5
description: The Nike Metcon 5 is known for its resilience in the most intense workouts. With its support and traction, it provides confidence in every movement.

name: MC Trainer 2
description: The Nike MC Trainer 2 is ideal for cross-training. With its lightweight and versatility, it adapts to different types of exercise.

name: Alpha Trainer 5
description: The Nike Alpha Trainer 5 is training footwear with a focus on comfort. With its cushioning and support, it's perfect for long training sessions.

name: Super Rep Go 3
description: The Nike SuperRep Go 3 is ideal for high-intensity workouts. With its easy on-and-off design, it offers support and flexibility in movements.
